amendment.description: To restore law enforcement assistance, and juvenile justice assistance, especially title V and JAB6 to the Department of Justice.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2843 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2843 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2668; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2668) To restore law enforcement assistance, and juvenile justice assistance, especially title V and JAB6 to the Department of Justice.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2843 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2843 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Hatch.
